These tangy, sweet gemstones atop a plastic, expandable ring fit nearly any finger, with a handy disc to keep dribbles away from your fingers. This item remains a top-ranked candy offering and has a proven track record as a top seller. It's ideal for all occasions including convenience stores, concessions, vending machines, offices, parties and pantries. Features 44 individually wrapped Ring Pops in each jar, including new Ring Pop Sours.

title: Baby Bottle Pop Colorfest Individually Wrapped Blue Raspberry Christmas Party Pack ‚Äì 10 Count Blue Raspberry Lollipops w/ Powdered Sugar Dip - Perfect Candy For Stocking Stuffers & Christmas Parties
description: Blue Raspberry Baby Bottle Pop is the iconic silly, fruity lollipop with blue raspberry flavor-boosting candy powder that is perfect for blue-themed Christmas parties and celebrations! This fun baby bottle sucker and dipping powder is loved by kids, making the blue raspberry party pack perfect for sharing with family and friends! Add these silly blue lollipops to your Christmas candy dishes, share with loved ones, or add them to your Christmas gift bags! They are also the perfect individually wrapped lollipops for kids' birthday parties, baby showers, party favors or any special holiday occasion. Fun for kids, these silly candies are now available in a tasty bulk lollipop party pack. The unique baby bottle packaging contains a blue hard candy lollipop top with sour powdered candy into which the sucker can be dipped, so kids can lick, dip, shake, dunk, and lick again! Uncap the silliness at your next holiday gathering because the variety party pack means there's enough for everyone to share the fun together! Baby Bottle Pop blue candy lollipops are great Christmas candy for adding to stocking stuffers for kids who love the color blue! The perfect party favors for any blue-themed parties, candy gifts, goodie bags or rewards for everyone to enjoy--it's ideal for sharing! The blue baby bottle design means they're especially perfect for blue-themed baby showers and gender reveals. Shake things up at your next party or add these sweet treats as stocking stuffers or to your Christmas candy dish! Each blue party pack includes 10 individually-wrapped Baby Bottle Pop lollipops with candy powder for dipping in a classic mouth-watering fruity favorite - Blue Raspberry. Brighten up your next gathering and bring a bag of these tasty blue candy treats to share with friends and family. Our blue holiday candy mix is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

title: Ring Pop Individually Wrapped Bulk 20 Count Lollipop Variety Christmas Holiday Party Pack ‚Äî Lollipop Suckers w/ Assorted Flavors - Fun Candy for Holiday Parties and Stocking Stuffers
description: Ring Pop is the ultimate iconic wearable lollipop hard candy to hand out this holiday season, with an enormous eye-catching candy gem that's so deliciously playful, the fun never ends! Deliciously festive, this hard candy is adored by kids and adults alike, making it ideal for sharing with family and friends during the holidays! These shelf-stable treats can also add a fun twist to holiday celebrations! Vibrantly colorful and unique, Ring Pops add an extra level of fun to holiday parties and are the perfect lollipop snack to stuff Christmas stockings with. These shelf-stable candies are great for any kid's holiday candy bags! Ring Pop bulk variety packs are the ultimate candy for holiday parties, with a wide assortment of fruity flavors loved by adults and kids alike! They also make deliciously fun individually wrapped fillers for a holiday party favor candy bag, and make great holiday decorations! Celebrate Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanza, or New Year's with Ring Pop, because these lollipop assortments are great for any kid's holiday candy bags and make great stocking stuffers or candy gifts. So, what are you waiting for? Brighten up your next big holiday party with this iconic holiday sucker. Each lollipop variety bag includes 20 individually-wrapped Ring Pop gem candy lollipops in a selection of 5 assorted flavors, with everyone's classic mouthwatering favorites - Strawberry, Blue Raspberry, Cherry, Watermelon, and Twisted Berry Blast. Unwrap the fun at your next Christmas party, and share in the jolly fun with your favorite flavor from this 20-count variety pack! Ring Pop candy lollipops make an excellent gift candy, ideal for sharing with friends and other Christmas party-goers! Keep them in your pantry for a tasty snack, or a delicious holiday candy treat. Bring a bag to your Christmas party or gathering! Our holiday candy mix is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

reviews.review:
I am a huge tootsie roll fan and that is bulk of what is in this mix, but I also love Dots and mini sugar daddy suckers - which were a surprise because I didn't see the mini sugar daddies in the photo on the ad. Everything else is... well... 'ok.' A lot of Charm suckers (with bubble gum in the center) - YUCK. I toss those.

title: Ryse Core Series Loaded Pre | Pump, Energy, Strength | L-Citrulline, Beta Alanine, L-Theanine, Caffeine, Thinkamine | 30 Servings (Cherry Ring Pop¬Æ)

reviews.name: Jay B
reviews.reviewTitle: Works great for the gym but gross taste.
reviews.review: I‚Äôve used different types of pre-workouts, and I gotta say‚Ä¶ this one is pretty good. I workout a lot and I need myself a good pre-workout to get me pumped up and gets me moving when lifting. I definitely would recommend this product of you workout a lot, and have a good tolerance to caffeine. Only reason why I gave it four stars was because the flavor isn‚Äôt the best. It has a nasty sour taste at the end, but overall, good product. (Edit: I forgot to mentioned the flavor which is Tropical Punch.)

reviews.name: Nromano
reviews.review: I have been using Ryse for awhile now and needed a re-up on my pre workout quickly, therefore I ordered it from . Was a little skeptical but this product delivered. Great flavor, but a little on the "coconutty" side. Still great in my opinion however. The ingredients are pretty well balanced when compared to other pre workouts out there. I am a big fan of the "pump" and I can say that this product gives me some of the best pumps I have gotten. Great price in comparison to Ryse's actual website. 10/10 will be purchasing again.

reviews.name: Melanie
reviews.review: like this product, could maybe give u more for your dollar overall strong flavor , strong boost in energy and pump.

reviews.name: marina dem
reviews.reviewTitle: ITS ALL ABOUT BALANCE BUT I AM CONFLICTED.
reviews.review:
PROS: If you like swallowing (read my cons)
Its almost a halfway crack.
Focused vision.
More energy.
Pumps.

CONS: YOU CAN'T DRY SCOOP IT. I had the smartiest candy flavor and it forms multiple bubbles in my mouth which I had to try to keep swallowing and swallowing and swallowing then I was able to rinse it down with water.

Is it worth it? You get increased focus in the gym but you risk spitting the preworkout if you can't handle a dry scoop? If you say you mix the preworkout with water then and don't dry scoop it. SHUT THE HELL UP (sarcastically because I know u snowflakes can get butthurt). REAL MEN AND WOMEN DRY SCOOP IT.

OVERALL IT GETS A NICE BALANCE :) I think..

reviews.name: Kakes Cruz
reviews.review: Tastes great!!! Arrived early, highly recommend.

reviews.name: LA Saraz
reviews.review: One of my PWOs in rotation now. Good amount of beta alanine tingle, not too much but just enough to know its working

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.review: Item as it appeared

reviews.name: meghan jones
reviews.reviewTitle: Tastes like candy and electricity, and feels that way
reviews.review: I went easy on the first dose since this has a much higher caffeine content than my last pre-work out. I went in with a half scoop. It taste likes candy and electricity..not great, but I knocked it back. 10 minutes into my CrossFit class, my hands, feet, ears and face were all itchy and tingly and I was LIT through the whole class. Definitely got a serious boost from the stuff. Definitely not an every day preworkout for me, but definitely a good option for low energy days for a high intensity workout.

I guess my kids are not used to sweets anyway so anything seeter than fruits they find too sweet.

title: Bazooka Candy Brands Holiday Candy Box - 18 Count Lollipops W/ Assorted Flavors From Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop & Juicy Drop - Candy Gift Box For The Holidays - 12.4 Ounce (Pack Of 1)
description: Bazooka Candy Brands‚Äô lollipop candy mix is the ultimate bulk variety of hard candy this holiday season! Perfect for festive Christmas parties and winter celebrations, this candy box comes with an assortment of the iconic Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop, and Juicy Drop lollipop suckers in several mouth-watering flavors. These shelf-stable treats are the perfect individually wrapped lollipops to share with friends who love candy or to take with you to a Christmas or holiday party this year! These hard candies are adored by kids and adults alike, which makes them ideal for sharing with family and friends. Bazooka Candy Brands' variety box is the gift that keeps on giving! Deliciously simple, this bulk candy box contains a fantastic assortment of lollipops to share. This variety of lollipops has endless possibilities -- so make sure to bring them to a winter holiday party, birthday party, you can take them to an Ugly Sweater party, hand them out as party favors at your holiday party, or enjoy some with your kids at home. So, what are you waiting for? Take a box of these mouth-watering individually wrapped candy treats to your friends and family this holiday so they too can enjoy the delicious fun! Each 18-count variety candy box contains 6 Ring Pop lollipops, 4 Push Pop lollipops, 4 Baby Bottle Pop lollipops, and 4 Juicy Drop lollipops in an assortment of fruity flavors: Strawberry (all), Blue Raspberry (all), Cosmic Strawberry Lemonade (BBP),Cherry Watermelon (PP). Unwrap the fun at your upcoming holiday party because the variety pack means there are different tasty flavors for each to enjoy, but enough to go around and share the fun together! Bazooka Candy Brands' variety mix of hard candy lollipops is ideal for sharing! Keep them on hand as a pantry staple candy box for snacks or a delicious candy treat. Our holiday lollipop assortment is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

With the Bedwina Stretchable Candy Bracelets, Adults and Kids will be so happy when they hear that they can eat their latest fashion accessories! These delicious candy bracelets feature round candies on an elastic cord in pastel colors, including pink, yellow, orange, violet, and green. title: StarBakeSi Magnetic Phone Ring Holder, Compatible with Magsafe Phone Grip and Stand 3 in 1, Phone Holder for Hand, 180¬∞ Adjustable Phone Kickstand for iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 14 / 13 / 12 Series

reviews.name: SEB571
reviews.reviewTitle: Works great as a stand but not secure at all
reviews.review: The item is great, features work really well. The magnet is horrible, I was hoping that it would stick well but unfortunately if you move to much it falls off.

reviews.name: Will-Review4U
reviews.reviewTitle: Metal rings and strong magnetic hold
reviews.review:
¬†This MagSafe ring is more than just a ring. The metal exterior ring also serves as a kickstand. The inner ring is for the finger.

The magnet is thick and durable. It has a good adherence to the case of my phone. When it is on the case it can be turned 360¬∞. I can even do this when all of the rings are down and touching my case. They made this perfect to fit inside the case without the outer ring hitting the rim of my case.

When I have the finger ring propped out it can be swiveled outward more than 90 degrees. It does stop so that it doesn‚Äôt continue opening up. I like this so that I can put pressure back onto my phone and have a secure grip using the ring. The rain comes in handy when I am taking selfies. It also is a added security when I‚Äôm using my phone for Apple Pay or showing the screen of my phone to another person. It makes it far more difficult for the phone to slip out of my hands when I have the ring on my fingers.

The large outer ring allows me to prop my phone up. I can prop it up both in the landscape position or the portrait position. It is firm enough and it‚Äôs open position that I can actually touch my phone without it collapsing. The large circle makes for a great kickstand base so that the phone is far less likely to tip over the way it tends to with a small ring acting as a kickstand.

The magnet is black in colors. The inner and outer rings are both metal. The metal is strong and has the appearance of a metallic gunmetal. It is a very dark silver. All the hinges for the rings are the same material and color as the rings.

reviews.name: xeromist
reviews.reviewTitle: Weaker magnet than competition, absolutely massive!, double ring is nice
reviews.review:
I have a few MagSafe devices so I tried this with multiple phones and mounts. On one of the phones the magnetic hold is nice and strong but on the other phone it is just barely adequate. A vigorous shake and it falls right off. That second device has a weaker magnet so it's not entirely this product's fault but I have a competing MagSafe socket that holds strong on the same phone, so this one could be better.

I tried putting this socket on two MagSafe car mounts and it doesn't grab on the back side. This isn't an advertised feature but other MagSafe sockets can be used on mounts while still attached to your phone.

This thing is huge! 67mm across, 5mm thick, 50g of added weight! On smaller phones this will be nearly as wide as your phone. This is somewhat expected because you are getting two rings but you won't forget it's on your phone. The thickness is a bit puzzling. The actual pop rings are maybe 3.5mm like other sockets but the magnetic ring is notably thicker. So you end up with a gap between the pop rings and your phone. They don't sit flush. The only thing that comes to mind is some phones having a camera bump close to the charging coil, so they had to add extra height to be more compatible.

I will say, if you use your phone for a lot of media consumption the large ring is great! It stays at whatever angle you set and the large size provides great stability, unlike smaller rings that can be awkward to get a perfect angle.

Personally, I don't see myself using this one often. I feel like I have to give up too much in terms of bulk and weight, plus not being able to use it on mounts. It's a nice idea but just not worth it in my opinion.

reviews.name: Lady J
reviews.review:
I really love all things MagSafe, and this is no exception.

My pros: This magnetic phone grip fits our iPhone 14 Pro phone perfectly. Its unique features make it stand out from other similar grips. There are two rings- a small inner ring that fits both large and small fingers, and a larger outer ring that rotates and serves as a stand for the phone. The stand feature works in both landscape and portrait mode, and has a flat base for better stability, great for viewing or filming video! The inner ring does not rotate, but the whole magnet will rotate easily, even while on your finger.

My cons: The magnet is just barely average in grip strength. It comes off easier than other magnetic grip, while still having good stickiness to our MagSafe cases from Spiegen. It will come off if put into a pants pocket. You can't have this mounted on the phone and still attach it to a magnetic phone stand or car charger, as you can with other grips with stronger magnets.

We really love the design of this magnetic grip/stand, it just needs slightly stronger magnets to serve our needs. It might well be sticky enough for you, if you don't need a gorilla strength magnet like we do.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review:
My pop-socket MagSafe broke in a fall so I bought this trying to replace it. Thought it would be stronger, as the the other reviews say.

They were wrong. It is not nearly as strong as popsocket. Not even close. It felt so weak. It kept coming off. I returned it that same day and ordered another pop socket. I‚Äôm not a fan of how the pop sockets break if you drop the phone, but the magnet is fantastic and that matters more.

This product is a dud

reviews.name: Shawna N.
reviews.reviewTitle: Does not stick well to phone
reviews.review:
If I can give no stars I would. This product is false advertisement. WASTE of money. Don‚Äôt spend your money on this.
The magnetic attachment does NOT stick very well to the back of the phone when doing active motions. When I had tested the item while running, my phone dropped multiple times and then tested the item further, my phone had dropped even when I had bent over to grab something.

reviews.name: GGreat
reviews.reviewTitle: It‚Äôs a little big on the phone but does magnetize well.
reviews.review: I have an iPhone 13pro max and this almost entirely covers the back of my phone. It does magnetize well and makes it easy to set my phone up. However I‚Äôm more used to pop sockets so trying to hold the rings wasn‚Äôt as comfortable or natural. I tried it on my daughters iPhone 13 and it does still fit the back of that phone too but is much closer to the edges on that one.
